TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TrueTypeFontMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定印表機如何處理格式化為 TrueType 字型的文字。

span.span: Specifies how a printer handles text that is formatted with a TrueType font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks TrueType 字型*向量*字型，指示印表機驅動程式和螢幕驅動程式如何繪製圖形的字母，並進行填寫。TrueType fonts are *vector* fonts, which instruct printer drivers and screen drivers how to draw the shapes of the letters and fill them in. 向量字型對比與*點陣*是只要清單的字型。Vector fonts contrast with *raster* fonts, which are simply lists. 點陣字型有一個清單每個字母的每個可用的字型的大小，而這個清單會決定每個像素的字母，是否會列印。A raster font has a list for each letter of each available font size, and the lists determine, for every pixel in the letter, whether it prints. 您可以增加或減少幾乎任何點大小; 向量字型不過，向量字型可以降低列印，因為它們會佔用大量的印表機記憶體。You can enlarge or reduce vector fonts to almost any point size; however, vector fonts can slow printing because they occupy a large amount of printer memory. 此外，某些印表機不支援 TrueType 字型。Also, some printers do not support TrueType fonts. 較新的印表機通常會透過下列方式避免這些問題。Newer printers often avoid these problems by doing the following. - 轉換泛型向量字型的外框字型 TrueType 字型。Converting a TrueType font into an outline font, which is a generic vector font. 許多不支援 TrueType 字型的印表機支援外框字型。Many printers that do not support TrueType fonts, do support outline fonts. - 建立暫存點陣字型看起來就像是 TrueType 字型。Creating a temporary raster font that looks just like a TrueType font. 印表機必須建立個別的暫存點陣字型的每種文件使用的字型大小。The printer must create a separate temporary raster font for each font size that the document uses. 基於這個原因，如果列印工作會使用許多字型大小，印表機會使用的總記憶體可能大於 TrueType 字型會使用。For that reason, if a print job uses many font sizes, the total memory that the printer uses might be greater than what a TrueType font would use. - 視為圖形文件中的每個文字區域。Treating each text area in the document as a graphic. 如果裝置需要列印文件包含非常少的文字，請下載成圖形的文字可以使用較少印表機的記憶體比下載字型。If a device needs to print a document that contains very little text, downloading text as a graphic can use less printer memory than downloading a font. 針對這些用途使用此類型的值：Use the values of this type for these purposes: - 為成員集合，其屬性的，這些值會指出上述技術所提供特定的印表機。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate which of the preceding techniques is available for a particular printer. 許多印表機都支援一個以上的這些技術。Many printers support more than one of these techniques. - 值為屬性，值會指示以特定方式處理 TrueType 字型的印表機。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer to handle TrueType fonts in a particular way. **未知**屬性中不會使用值物件。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 您應該永遠不會設定屬性**未知**。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果其他產生應用程式已建立*PrintTicket 文件*無法辨識的選項來設定 TrueType 字型處理功能 (也就是未定義中的選項[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)，則該文件，建構應用程式中的物件都有**未知**做為值屬性。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the TrueType font handling feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397), then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 雖然和類別無法被繼承，您可以擴充[列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)辨識不計算中的列印裝置功能或類別。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NOTINBUILD： 如何： 列印結構描述和建立新的列印系統類別擴充](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885)。For more information see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885). ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何測試印表機的功能，以及設定列印工作，以充分利用它們。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure the print job to take advantage of them. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode Automatic = int32(1)

summary.span: 印表機驅動程式將決定處理 TrueType 字型的最佳方式。

span.span: The printer driver decides the best method for handling TrueType fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode DownloadAsNativeTrueTypeFont = int32(4)

summary.span: 印表機驅動程式會下載 TrueType 字型。

span.span: The printer driver downloads the TrueType font.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode DownloadAsOutlineFont = int32(2)

summary.span: 印表機驅動程式會將 TrueType 字型下載為描邊字。

span.span: The printer driver downloads the TrueType font as an outline font.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode DownloadAsRasterFont = int32(3)

summary.span: 印表機驅動程式會為其所需要的各種 TrueType 字型大小建立點陣字型，並將它們全部下載。

span.span: The printer driver creates a raster font for each size of the TrueType font that it needs and downloads them all.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode RenderAsBitmap = int32(5)

summary.span: 印表機驅動程式會將每個文字區域下載為圖形。

span.span: The printer driver downloads each area of text as a graphic.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.TrueTypeFontMode Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 功能 (其選項由這個列舉表示) 會設定為未定義的選項。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined.

summary.span: [列印結構描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) \(英文\) 中未定義的選項。
